attributes.action: Give us a roads infrastructure that completely elimates traffic jams.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To give the people a roads infrastructure that eliminates traffic jams, gridlock, congestion, and also reduces fuel consumption, journey times, pollution, road rage, accidents, death and injuries on our roads. 
There are ways available that will give a liquid flow traffic to our roads, allowing motorists to complete journeys without even stopping.
Your Government and Minister has been apprised of these.

Prime Minister - we are taxed billions to pay for our roads, we deserve the best in the world! give us a 21st Century roads infrastructure before our transport system grinds to a complete stop!
